title: Mutekki Media Vengeance Effects Volume 2
description:
More than 750 high quality FX sounds & loops for all kinds of modern dance music!

Vengeance Essential Club Sounds 2 from Mutekki Media feautures over 2,500 samples 
for Trance, Techno, Hardstyle, Hands Up and Italo Dance
Vengeance Essential Club Sounds Volume 2 also includes samples suitable for Breakbeat,
Minimal, Techhouse and Progressive Dance. Besides kicks, claps, fx, loops, synths, 
snares, you\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\&#039;ll also find some quirky acid sounds, a fascinating human beatbox, bass
sounds and much more. Click the Listen Now button on the left to get a preview of
this product
What\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\&#039;s included in Essential Club Sounds 2?

Includes over 650 MB of first class club and dance oriented drums and sounds as
well as diverse FX and loops, that can take your production to a higher level.
The material has been programmed according to the dance genre and is adaptable
in the range of 120 to 150 BPM (beats per minute). If you write either house,
trance or techno then this product is like the name suggests, essential!
About Manuel Schleis and Manuel Reuter - Producers of the Vengeance Series

The Vengeance Sample CD Series is produced by much respected and loved German
producers, Manuel Schleis and Manuel Reuter. Manuel Schleis is not just a Sample
CD creator; his house, trance and techno synthesizer patches are amongst the best
in the world. Furthermore, he has written synthesizer factory presets for companies
such as Roland, Access, Waldorf & reFX. His partner, Manuel Reuter, is likewise an 
active and successful producer, and he is behind projects such as DJ Manian, Yanou, 
Cascada and Plazmatek. Apart from that they have also been engaged to deliver remix 
works for well known chart acts as the likes of Groove Coverage, 4 Strings, Pulsedriver
and Klubbingman. You are in safe hands here!


Size: 550 MB
Unpacks to about 777 MB
.bin file
